sentences.sContent: He had been taking part in an international symposium on population.
sentences.sCn: 他那时在参加一个有关人口的国际研讨会。

synos.tran: 讨论会，座谈会；专题论文集；酒宴，宴会

trans.tranCn: 讨论会，座谈会；专题论文集；酒宴，宴会
trans.tranOther: a formal meeting in which people who know a lot about a particular subject have discussions about it
